entry.title: Saturday night: Showers or thunderstorms. Low 14.
entry.summary: Showers with a few thunderstorms ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Risk of severe thunderstorms early this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low 14. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016
